alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:18PM EDT until May 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN CLINTON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harrigan, New York moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Mooers, Altona, Burke, Churubusco, Ellenburg Depot, Merrill, Bryants Mill, Chateaugay, Lyon Mountain, Ellenburg, Irona, Sciota, Mooers Forks, Alder Bend, Cannon Corners, Ellenburg Mountain, Miner Lake State Park, Harrigan, Ellenburg Center and Owls Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
